thread.title: InventHelp Invention Prevents Cell-Phone Owners From Missing Calls (CVL-306)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Invention Prevents Cell-Phone Owners From Missing Calls (CVL-306) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Invention Prevents Cell-Phone Owners From Missing Calls (CVL-306)
text:
A leading invention firm, InventHelp is working to submit this idea, the HEAR IT, to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
After missing several calls from friends due to not hearing the cell phone ring, an inventor from Olmstead Township, Ohio, decided that there needs to be a way to prevent missed calls.
To meet this need he designed the easy-to-use and versatile, patent-pending HEAR IT, a device that ensures that a user knows of all incoming calls whether indoors or outdoors. It avoids missed calls and frustration, as well as promotes peace of mind.
The original design was submitted to the Cleveland office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-CVL-306, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
